title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metal wire, paillettes
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with a tire-shaped wooden bead as its base. The bead is covered with woven linen embroidered with metal threads, metal coils and paillettes. From this hang several pendant braids terminating in clusters of small braided balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen, silk, metal wire, paillettes
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-59.
